org.drip.param.product

Class CurrencyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.product.CurrencyPair

  • public class CurrencyPair
extends Serializer
    CurrencyPair class contains the numerator currency, the denominator currency, the quote currency, and the PIP Factor
